title-group.article-title: Author Correction: Prognostic value of neutrophil count to albumin ratio in patients with decompensated cirrhosis

body.p: Correction to: Scientific Reports 10.1038/s41598-023-44842-9, published online 25 November 2023
The Funding section in the original version of this Article was omitted. The Funding section now reads:

“This research was funded by Fundamental Research Funds for the Central Universities (No.226-2023-00127, 2021FZZX001-41), the National Key Research and Development Program of China (No. 2021YFC2301800 and 2022YFC2304501) and Medical Health Science and Technology Project of Zhejiang Provincial Health Commission (No. 2022490480).”
The original Article has been corrected.
